name: Emily Em Outro Mundo (Emily in another World)
name_original: Emily Em Outro Mundo (Emily in another World)
description:
Emily Em Outro Mundo (Emily in another World) was an ambitious project given the experience and time me and my group had at the time it was made. It is a transmedia of the movie "Coraline", and its story happens some years after the movie's.

The game is in Portuguese so... sorry for that! Upcoming translation in a future update!
